publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2791 Michael McMahon: Congratulations to the Bellshill Speaker on Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Bellshill Speaker newspaper on its Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign, which remembers all of our service personnel who have fought for our country in the past 90 years and urges the local community in Bellshill to get behind the campaign and donate parcels for those service personnel currently serving us abroad as we approach Christmas.
S3M-2791 Congratulations to the Bellshill Speaker on Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign (lodged on 29 October 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Jack McConnell*

S3M-2791 Michael McMahon: Congratulations to the Bellshill Speaker on Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Bellshill Speaker newspaper on its Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign, which remembers all service personnel who have fought for our country in the past 90 years and urges the local community in Bellshill to get behind the campaign and donate parcels for those service personnel currently serving us abroad as Christmas approaches. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell, Jim Tolson*, Robin Harper*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Ken Macintosh*, Helen Eadie*, Jackie Baillie*, Sarah Boyack*, Keith Brown*, Paul Martin*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Elaine Murray*, Cathy Peattie*, Des McNulty*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-2791 Congratulations to the Bellshill Speaker on Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign (lodged on 29 October 2008) James Kelly*, Trish Godman*
S3M-2791 Congratulations to the Bellshill Speaker on Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign (lodged on 29 October 2008) Hugh O’Donnell*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-2791 Congratulations to the Bellshill Speaker on Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign (lodged on 29 October 2008) Cathy Jamieson*, Margaret Mitchell*, Alex Neil*
S3M-2791 Congratulations to the Bellshill Speaker on Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign (lodged on 29 October 2008) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-2791 Congratulations to the Bellshill Speaker on Remember our Heroes: Past and Present Campaign (lodged on 29 October 2008) David Stewart*, Karen Whitefield*
